artist: Artist: R. Crumb , et al.; Printer: Highland Press, Athol, Mass.; Publisher: Everett Rand Lewisburg, W. Va.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of figure with crosshatching and text printed in silver offset lithography on plum textured, wove paper covers; 56 pp.
medium: Silver and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Mineshaft, no. 10
